node.display_name: Rubicon Express Monotube Shock Absorber Kits
node.long_desc: Developed and tuned specifically for each application;Deliver maximum control while not compromising ride quality;Robotically welded;14mm steel piston;Shock Absorber Kit includes four shocks;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rubicon Express Extreme-Duty monotube shocks help you get the most out of your suspension. These robotically welded shocks are specifically calibrated and tested to provide your vehicle the best possible ride both on and off-road. Their monotube design provides excellent heat dissipation and their large, digressive piston offers responsive control. Their 14mm nitro steel piston rods won't chip or peel like chrome rods can, and their multi seals and low-friction piston rod bearings ensure longevity. Urethane bushings add durability to these Rubicon Express Extreme-Duty monotube shocks. If you're looking for consistency, strength, and performance both on and off the trail, look no further than Rubicon Express!

Every TrailMax II seat provides the maximum in seating comfort, durability and safety. For unsurpassed appearance and durability, premium vinyl fabric maintains its shape in any temperature, is mildew resistant and is offered in factory original colors. Atlas Frame is sturdy and resists corrosion. Seats contain Variable Rate of Resistance springs for comfort on the road and support on the trail. Best quality high density closed cell foam minimizes fatigue and maintains the seat shape, ensuring comfort and best appearance for years to come. Rotary recliner dial mounts to either side of the seat allowing its use for drive or passenger. Built-in headrest. Elastic mesh map pocket offers handy access storage. Seats available in complementary vinyl and cloth fabric combinations.

NOTE: 1997-02 Wrangler applications require seat adapter bracket part number 51256-01 for each seat. 2003-06 Wrangler applications require seat adapter bracket 51245-01 (Driver Side) and 51248-01 (Passenger side)

node.long_desc: Bestop's Trektop Classic Jeep soft tops are constructed of premium fabric that maintains shape in varying temperatures, is mildew-resistant and contains UV inhibitors;Bestop's soft tops for Jeeps include door surrounds, soft top fabric, window panels and tailgate bar;Removable rear window slides into place with included tailgate bar;Side windows are permanently fixed to deck fabric and have 31% tint;On JK models, the top rolls back for an open air sunroof" experience;The four-door models Wrangler soft top rolls back far enough to uncover both front and rear seats!;Two-year warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Bestop's original frameless Trektop Classic was a showstopper when it was first introduced back in 2008. It even won Chrysler's 2008 Design Excellence Award and is the forerunner to their best-selling Trektop NX. You don't need factory frames and bows so installation is quick and easy. Trektop Classic is a complete replacement soft top with fast-back styling at an economical price.

node.display_name: Bestop Replace-a-Top Trektop NX Soft Tops
node.long_desc: Frameless fastback style soft top for Jeeps;Features Bestop Wrangler Soft Top Arch support;Takes away the Jeep soft top bows and frames;Uses the Wrangler sport bars to give it shape and support;With windows removed, functions as a Safari Bikini Top;Everything you need for installation;Includes main soft top deck fabric, tinted 30-mil side and rear windows and rear window curtain;Requires your existing Trektop NX door surrounds, knobs, tailgate bar and clips, rear crossbow and windshield header assembly;Bestop's multi-layer premium fabric maintains its shape in all temperatures, is mildew-resistant, contains UV inhibitors;Two Year warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Bestop's new inchbowless inch fastback top. The Trektop NX features removable windows, factory style-door surrounds, Sunrider sunroof features, and factory-style header bar. The Trektop NX features our Top Arch support. Designed specifically to minimize fabric flapping, especially at higher speeds, and avoid puddles forming in the center of your soft top after a hard rain storm. The Top Arch spans across the Jeep right above the head of both driver and passenger. The Trektop NX takes away the top bows and frames, and uses the Wrangler sport bars to give it shape and support. This gives the top a fastback or inchraceback inch look that's stylish, and different than factory soft tops or Supertops. With side and rear windows removed, the Trektop NX functions as a Safari Bikini Top.

node.display_name: Bestop Trektop Pro Hybrid Soft Tops
node.long_desc: Industry-first hard rear glass hatch on a JK Wrangler soft top for easy, one hand operation and easy accessibility to rear cargo area;Premium 30-oz. triple-layer black acrylic twill fabric for durability and great, no-wrinkles appearance Jeep soft top;Bestop's Sunrider flip-back panel for open air driving;Weighs less than a hard top, can help save gas;Sliding glass side windows for extra ventilation for front & rear seat passengers or pets;Easy install or removal of rear hatch and side window panels;Rear glass hatch has gas assist struts and integrated defroster connector plus mounting points for optional rear wiper motor assembly;Rear hatch is removable unlike factory or aftermarket hard tops;With side panels and rear glass removed, Trektop Pro becomes a Safari Bikini open air soft top for Jeeps;Includes hardware, door surrounds, rear arch module, side windows, safety glass hatch with built-in defroster grid;Optional Window Storage Portfolio available to store the side window panels and rear hatch glass;Limited Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Trektop Pro is the next step in soft top design for JK Wrangler. A true hybrid top integrating the easy-lift rear glass hatch of a hard top with the advantages of an ultra premium soft top that has no zippers. Industry-first hard rear glass hatch on a soft top for easy, one hand operation and easy accessibility to rear cargo area. Premium 30-oz. triple-layer black acrylic twill fabric for durability and great, no-wrinkles appearance. Bestop's Sunrider flip-back panel for open air driving. Weighs up to 50 lbs. less than a hard top, can help save gas. Sliding glass side windows for extra ventilation for front & rear seat passengers or pets. Easy install or removal of rear hatch and side window panels. Rear glass hatch has gas assist struts and integrated defroster connector plus rear wiper motor assembly mounting point. Rear hatch is removable unlike factory or aftermarket hard tops. With side panels and rear glass removed, Trektop Pro becomes a Safari Bikini top for open air driving. Includes hardware, door surrounds, rear arch module, side windows, safety glass hatch with built- in defroster connection. To connect both defroster and a rear wiper motor assembly on Wrangler without factory hardtop, order BST54858-01 Wiper Motor Assembly. To connect rear window defroster on Wrangler that DOES NOT have factory hardtop, order BST54857-01 Wiring Harness. To connect rear window defroster on Wrangler that has a factory hardtop, no additional harnesses needed. Just plug Trektop Pro harness into factory harness on the vehicle and you are ready to go.

node.long_desc: Made of heavy-duty, 16 gauge carbon steel, with textured black powder coat;Secure to factory seat mounting points with your facgtory seat riser bolts;Secures with high-tech, pick-resistant lock and comes with two keys;Excellent storage solution to conceal valuables and personal protection;Does not interfere with driver's seat adjustment;Not compatible with Tilt & Flip front seat;No drilling required;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Storage Box securely locks up valuables, and mounts out-of-sight conveniently beneath the driver's seat. Heavy-duty 16 gauge carbon steel, welded construction deters would-be thieves, and offers up to 205 cubic inches of storage space in a sliding drawer, secured with a pick-resistant lock. Heavy-duty, plated Slides assure dependable, durable operation. The Storage Box is finished in textured black powder coat. This is a must-have product for every Jeep JK Wrangler and Wrangler Unlimited owner. Providing critical protection against theft, the Storage Box comes with two keys for the high-tech, pick-resistant rugged stainless steel lock. Does not interfere with Driver's seat adjustment and attaches underneath drivers seat using factory seat riser bolts.

node.display_name: BF Goodrich Commercial T/A Traction Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 31 to 32 inch tall tires;Rim Range 16 inch diameter;Sidewalls: Black Letters;Tread Type: All Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: BFGoodrich Commercial T/A Traction is the best tire for those less-than-ideal road conditions. With a tread designed for snow, mud and practically any conditions. This tire is suitable for drive axle or both axles on trucks that spend time off-road. Made for extreme snow and ice conditions and still molded to accept studs when conditions demand the ultimate in traction. A truck and fleet tire with aggressive tread to go wherever your route requires.

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 32 to 35 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 16 inch diameter;Sidewalls: Black or White Letters;Tread Type: Mud Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The BFGoodrich Baja T/A has been chosen by more Baja 1000 champions than all other tires combined. You can be confident with the high-speed performance and excellent off-road soft surface traction. More tread element edges, great side bite and lateral traction in off-road situations are just a few things you can expect from the Baja T/A! Built for the toughest conditions on earth with exceptional strength, bruise resistance, sidewall puncture resistance and structural integrity. You can tell from the distinctive appearance this aggressive, self-cleaning tread design with black-outline serrated letters and unique Baja T/A? insignia is the worlds first ultra-high performance off-road Tire. Off-road racing competitors and people who insist on driving on the same tires as top off-road racing pros like Rob MacCachren, Ed and Troy Herbst choose the BFG Baja T/A.

node.display_name: BF Goodrich g-Force Sport Comp-2 Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 23 to 26 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 16 inch diameter;Sidewalls: Black Letters;Tread Type: Street Tire;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Best-in-class dry handling puts more sport in sport compact tires. According to tests at the LPG facility in South Carolina for V/Z dry performance summer-oriented tires.

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 22 to 26 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 18 inch diameter;Sidewalls: Black Letters;Tread Type: Street Tire;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: G-Force R1 Sports and Performance Tires, Competition Tires. Icon Summer Tire with legendary performance for the track. One second faster laps than the competition on a 1 mile road course. Test conducted by The Tire Rack at the Michelin LPG facility. g-Control sidewall inserts generate tremendous cornering force with excellent driver feedback. Helps to turn your fastest laps. Predictable grip inspires confidence and helps lower your lap times. Predictable grip character that's easy to drive at the limit, and confidence inspiring for the quickest lap times in amateur road race competition. Easy to drive at the grip limit. Can be used at different wheel postions and rotated in both directions, to maximize tread life for the most possible laps at the race track. Symmetric, non-directional tread design. Minimal break-in required. Molded to 4/32nds of an inch tread depth. No shaving required. Competition ready. Split second steering response and precise turn-in enable precision at the track. Razor sharp steering response. The g-Force R1 tread compound offers quick warm-up, superior cornering power and consistent grip lap after lap. Best in R1 DOT street legal class dry grip.

node.display_name: BF Goodrich All-Terrain T/A KO2 Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 27 to 36 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 20 inch diameter;Sidewalls: White Letters;Tread Type: All Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
BFGoodrich All-Terrain T/A KO2 has a 20 percent tougher sidewall and features race-proven CoreGard Technology to take on the toughest road hazards with confidence. The split and bruise resistant sidewall rubber is derived from BFGoodrich's race proven Baja T/A KR2 tire. Adding a thicker, extended shoulder rubber down the sidewall helps to protect more of the critical sidewall failure zone. BFG has longer teadlife tires that extend your adventures On and Off-Road. Specially formulated tread rubber that has been optimally blended to reduce chip and tear for superior gravel road endurance. The advanced tire footprint shape results in more evenly distributed stress, for longer more uniform wear. Interlocking tread design will provide increased tread block stability, for more even wear over the long haul. Reject stone retention and provide extra tread cleanout protection against stone drilling with the BFG Stone Ejectors. Aggressive All-Terrain Traction that exceeds the Rubber Manufacturer Association Severe Snow Traction performance requirements to confidently get where you want to go in any weather condition.

If you've ever been in the middle of off-roading and had a tire give out on you, you know how frustrating it can be. Unfortunately, that's something you're always at risk for if you're shopping for cheap tires and neglecting to change them when the tread wears down. If you want to make sure your ride is always ready for the mud, the BFG KO2 tires offer the perfect combination of excellent all-terrain performance and durability. You can find KO2 tires and tons of other great BF Goodrich tires among the wide selection we offer at 4 Wheel Parts.

Roll with Confidence

There are a lot of things that separate cheap tires from the best brands, but durability is one of the biggest factors. Nobody wants tires that wear out quickly, especially if you're driving on diff"

node.long_desc: Heavy Duty Strut Cartridge; Bilstein 4600 series;Body Diameter:2 in;Type:strut cartridge;Finish:white;Reservoir:no;Boots included: no;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Bilstein's technically superior, patented monotube gas charged design allows the excessive heat from the oil to transfer to the outer surface of the shock body and dissipate more efficiently. The dividing piston also permits the oil to expand as heat builds, preventing aeration (foaming) and viscosity loss. This allows the shock to maintain full damping characteristics as temperatures rise.The tube of a Bilstein Gas Pressure Shock Absorber is fabricated using a special extrusion method. This process achieves an extremely tight peak-to-valley tolerance and maintains consistent wall thickness. Bilstein's seamless monotube design provides superior tube strength while maximizing heat dissipation and shock life.The piston head design allows independent tuning of the compression and rebound damping forces to provide optimum ride comfort and performance without compromise. It features fewer parts than most conventional twin tube and so called inch inchroad sensing inch inch shock designs. This simple, yet exceptionally functional digressive design contributes to the extreme durability and long life of Bilstein Shock Absorbers.

node.display_name: BF Goodrich Rugged Trail T/A Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 29 to 33 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 18 inch diameter;Sidewalls: Black or White Letters;Tread Type: All Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: BFG Radial T/A Hot Rod Tires. Icon All Weather Tire that is an American performance icon. Wide profile styling for modern muscle. Raised white letter and wide profile styling. Superb lateral stability and steering response. Classic look with modern technology. Nearly 40 years of real racing heritage and technology. North Americas first performance radial tire. High performance with low noise levels. Unique tread block phasing. Exceptional wet and dry traction and control, with long, even wear. Variable groove angle geometry and performance tread compounding.

node.display_name: BF Goodrich Rugged Terrain T/A Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 29 to 33 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 20 inch diameter;Sidewalls: Black or White Letters;Tread Type: All Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: From the company that brought you the legendary All-Terrain T/A KO, comes another tire destined to win hearts off road as well as on it. The Rugged Terrain T/A. It?s the newest addition to BFGoodrich?s light truck tire line-up, fitting between the All-Terrain T/A KO built for extreme off-road performance and the Long Trail T/A Tour built primarily for the road. With bold, aggressive looks, the Rugged Terrain delivers just the right amount of off-road performance with a smooth on-road ride. It also offers excellent wet traction and a 50K Mile Manufacturer?s Limited Tread Life Warranty* making it one of the most versatile tires on the road. So if you drive a lot of miles on the highway and pavement and still want light off-road capability then the Rugged Terrain is the perfect upgrade for you.

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 24 to 30 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 14 to 15 inch diameter;Sidewalls: White Letters;Tread Type: Street Tire;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: BFG Radial T/A Hot Rod Tires. Icon All Weather Tire that is an American performance icon. Wide profile styling for modern muscle. Raised white letter and wide profile styling. Superb lateral stability and steering response. Classic look with modern technology. Nearly 40 years of real racing heritage and technology. North Americas first performance radial tire. High performance with low noise levels. Unique tread block phasing. Exceptional wet and dry traction and control, with long, even wear. Variable groove angle geometry and performance tread compounding.

node.display_name: BF Goodrich Radial Long Trail T/A Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 27 to 33 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 20 inch diameter;Sidewalls: Black or White Letters;Tread Type: All Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: BFGoodrich Long Trail T/A Tour is a tire for people who love to drive - and drive a lot. Backed by a 60,000-Mile Manufacturer's Limited Treadlife Warranty and designed for a responsive and spirited highway ride driving on the road. The proprietary ETEC System (Equal Tension Containment System) helps this tire deliver durability and stability at high speeds. You?re in control, not the weather; BFG has strategic siping and rain channels that keep you in control in rainy, snowy and dry weather conditions.

node.display_name: BF Goodrich Mud Terrain KM2 Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 28 to 42 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 22 inch diameter;Sidewalls: Black or White Letters;Tread Type: Mud Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: BFGoodrich Mud-Terrain T/A KM2 Tire when roadside assistance is not an option the super-tough sidewall compound and 3-ply construction resists cuts and bruises to take the edge off of rocks and other off-road hazards. Overcome nearly any obstacle with linear flex zones that allow the tire to conform and grab obstacles in aired-down driving. Leave the tow rig at home Drive to the trails with better road manners and less noise than you'd expect in an unstoppable off-road tire! The T/A KM2 is an excellent tire for the driver who needs great off-road traction, but still wants a good wearing, long mileage street tire. The Mud-Terrain T/A KM2 has a footprint made to dominate almost anything in its path. Smart design gives it excellent mud-clearing ability and low road noise.

node.sales_desc: g-Force T/A KDW will bring ultra high performance to more vehicles than any other tire line.The right look for your tuned ride with over 80 tire sizes for rims from 15 inch to 24 inch chances are theres a g-Force T/A KDW for your car. Cutting-edge appearance with real GO to match and g-Control sidewall inserts resist deflection for more control in high-speed cornering. Exceptional dry and wet traction and handling with low noise, unidirectional racing-influenced tread design

node.display_name: BF Goodrich Krawler T/A KX Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 35 to 42 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 20 inch diameter;Sidewalls: Black or White Letters;Tread Type: Mud Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Large deep lugs, deeper than Mud Terrain KM2. Designed for exceptional traction in rock, mud and dirt. One of the highest puncture resistant sidewalls ever offered. Sidewalls and lugs aid both traction and puncture resistance. Softer tread compound conforms to uneven surfaces. Rim protector provides protection during aired-down situations.

node.display_name: BF Goodrich g-Force Super Sport A/S Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 26 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 17 inch diameter;Sidewalls: Black Letters;Tread Type: Street Tire;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Performance never has to take a day off with the BF Goodrich g-Force Super Sport A/S! Tenacious grip in dry, wet and snow so you will be prepared for any weather. Anti-hydroplaning Aqua Chute channels for wet conditions and tread blocks designed to grip snow for true year-round control. Deep, wide circumferential grooves and radically swept back Aqua Chute lateral grooves. With this enhanced water evacuation at speed to reduce hydroplaning for confident wet traction even in deep water situations. Best-in-class dry handling puts more sport in sport compact tires. 50,000 mile limited warranty (See warranty for details) with legendary performance.

node.sales_desc: g-Force T/A Drag Radial is a revolutionary performance for street and track tire. The original street-legal world record setter with proprietary drag-racing compound has a devastating grip. With grip off the line and stability through the trap. Equal TEnsion Containment (ETEC) System resists centrifugal force to maintain a consistent footprint. High-speed stability and control, plus more cornering performance for improved overall handling and balance. Special radial-carcass construction. Helps resist centrifugal force to promote the consistency of the footprint, which maintains tread contact area for maximized grip off the line. Equal TEnsion Containment (ETEC) System resists centrifugal force to maintain a consistent footprint.

node.long_desc: Clover Patch's Convert-a-Top - Jeep Bikini Top comes in Black only;Gives your soft top greater versatility;Converts soft top to safari style Bikini Top for Jeeps;Eliminates corner flapping with the windows out;Rear bow assembly tension straps are included ;Contains two pockets to hold the sail panels in position, panel straps to hold the sail panels to your roll bar and two long straps that go from the tub to the rear (3rd) bow;During rain, protects more of the inside than other Wrangler bikini tops and safari type tops;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Clover Patch Convert-A-Top enables you to travel in open air comfort. With the top up, and windows out, it stops the annoying flapping noise coming from your sail panels. The Convert-A-Top folds up your sail panels and safely stores them. Two straps put tension on the rear bow so your top is tight and flap free. Fits 1992-2007 Wranglers. Does not fit TJ Unlimited or JK 4 door. Your Jeep's noise level is greatly reduced at highway speeds, with the side and rear windows out, making conversation and listening to the radio possible. No more stopping in order to attach a sail panel that has become detached. With the sail panels up and out of the way visibility is greater and the sail panel is protected during off-roading.

node.long_desc: If you are looking to upgrade your stock coil, or want to compliment the performance of your MSD Blaster Ignition, MSD 5, 6 or 7, the Blaster Coil line is the right choice. All of the Blaster Coils are designed for improved spark output! Special 100:1 windings are used to provide maximum build-up of voltage! These windings are held secure and kept cool in an oil filled metal canister. The tower assembly is molded of durable alkyd material due to its high dielectric characteristics while wide spaced brass primary terminals prevent the possibility of spark. There are several versions of the Blaster Coil available. All of them have the same internal specifications, but have different housings or components. Each Blaster Coil can be used with a stock ignition.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: The coil-on-plug design puts the spark energy right out of the coil and across the plug gap, improving combustion and increasing voltage.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The coil-on-plug design puts the spark energy right out of the coil and across the plug gap, improving combustion and increasing voltage.

node.long_desc: This is our most popular performance distributor! The housing is machined from a billet of 6061-T6 aluminum on a state-of-the-art CNC machine producing exact tolerances. For high rpm stability, a .500 inch steel shaft is supported by a sealed ball bearing and a long sintered bushing. This shaft also receives a QPQ coating for friction reduction and resistance to corrosion. A precision machined reluctor is attached to the shaft which triggers the magnetic pick-up mounted in the housing. This high output magnetic pick-up is the most accurate way to trigger your ignition. Plus, with no moving parts to wear or adjust, the pick-up is maintenancefree! Just above the pick-up is MSD?s adjustable mechanical advance assembly. Different springs and stop bushings are supplied so you can tune an advance curve to match your application.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This is our most popular performance distributor! The housing is machined from a billet of 6061-T6 aluminum on a state-of-the-art CNC machine producing exact tolerances. For high rpm stability, a .500 inch steel shaft is supported by a sealed ball bearing and a long sintered bushing. This shaft also receives a QPQ coating for friction reduction and resistance to corrosion. A precision machined reluctor is attached to the shaft which triggers the magnetic pick-up mounted in the housing. This high output magnetic pick-up is the most accurate way to trigger your ignition. Plus, with no moving parts to wear or adjust, the pick-up is maintenancefree! Just above the pick-up is MSD?s adjustable mechanical advance assembly. Different springs and stop bushings are supplied so you can tune an advance curve to match your application.

node.long_desc: To prevent voltage leaks in passenger compartment mounted coil installations, MSD designed the Firewall Feed-Thru. node.long_desc: Trail mesh roll-up kit bag;Bubba Kinetic Energy Recovery Rope (4 options to choose from);Two Gator-Jaw;Synthetic Shackles;10' Tree Hugger protector strap;Winch line damper/tool pouch;Pair of 1 x 6' Bubba Rope camo ratchet tie-downs;Life Rock" Guard;Made in the USA ;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Bubba Rope is deicated to making the safest and best recovery gear in the USA. We take our products and our customers seriously while having fun in what we do. We created Bubba Rope as a fun life-style array of high quality American made products. Our one-of-kind snatch rope is adapted from military specifications and has been tested commercially for years, pulling out work trucks and heavy equipment from muddy job sites. Recreational 4x4s, ATVs and other off road vehicles can benefit from this kinetic energy technology to get unstuck faster and safer. What makes Bubba Rope unique is our process of dipping our double braided nylon rope in liquid vinyl in a trademarked Gator-ize process. This coating is what gives Bubba Rope its water, abrasion and UV resistant properties and ultimately a longer life span. Also, unlike other recovery rope companies Bubba Rope does not have others make our products and just put our name on it. Every Bubba Rope is made in our USA factory with our own trained master splicing technicians. Our main goal is to continue to make the best recovery rope and the best recovery gear ever! We hope you enjoy using them as much as we do creating them.

node.long_desc: Fits 2007-current JK Wrangler, Rubicon and Unlimited;2 and 4-door models;All brackets have been acid rinsed, zinc phosphate cleaned, e-coated, and power coated with a lightly textured black finish;Includes plastic wear pad;Requires parts HYL400.200.150;Threaded handle;Hardware included;Made in USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This HiLift jack mount is the perfect addition to the Hyline Offroad swingout tire carrier. It's specifically designed to fit with the Hyline Offroad JK Swingout Tire Carrier and features a sturdy and stylish option to hold your HiLift jack outside your vehicle. Additional features include a plastic wear pad that buffers the jack foot from the mounting bracket, threaded handle to easily remove/reinstall the jack and appropriately placed holes so you can lock your jack to the bracket using a cable lock or pad lock. All necessary hardware is provided for installation. The brackets are acid rinsed, zinc phosphate cleaned, e-coated and powder coated with a lightly textured durable black finish. Note: For proper installation, This product REQUIRES part number HYL400.200.150 (Accessory Mount Arm).

node.long_desc: For use with hard top models only;All steel construction for maximum strength;Supports up to 150lbs of cargo;Rattle free operation;No drill installation;Load area dimension - 18 inches x 36 inches;Floor to bottom of rack - 22 inches;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This all steel heavy duty Cargo Rack is perfect for increasing the interior carrying capabilities of the Jeep JL. The rack is located behind the rear seat creating a double deck storage area. The deck area of the rack is 22 inches above the floor and provides an additional 4-1/2 square feet of flat storage space.The three-piece design is constructed of steel plate that bolts to existing interior holes for an easy no drill installation. The rack provides a cargo carrying capacity of 150lbs. with rattle free operation. Multiple slotted holes on the perimeter of the cargo rack tray allow the use of tie down straps, bungee hooks or rope to properly secure cargo. This rack has been thoroughly tested in rugged offroad conditions and is finished in tactical black powdercoat with edge molding to prevent abrasions while accessing cargo. Fabtech's Cargo Rack is the strongest interior rack on the market for those that want the best for their JL Wrangler.

node.sales_desc: Designed for the serious off-road adventure seeker, the all new BILSTEIN 6112 Series Kit is the ultimate suspension solution. The 6112 Series optimizes off-road and on-road capabilities with a 60mm digressive piston for increased damping control. This kit features specially designed cold wound springs and an adjustable spring seat which allows for vehicle leveling, larger tires, and increased ground clearance. The kit comes with (2) 60mm shocks (2) springs and (2) billet spring seats. The 6112 is a direct bolt on application for late model half-ton trucks and SUVs which utilize a factory coilover suspension. The 6112 kit is for front applications and reuses the OEM top mount and spring isolators. To maximize performance, Bilstein recommends a 5160 Series remote reservoir shock for the rear

node.long_desc: Aries Offroad Styleguard offers a durable, textured surface for a refined look and ultimate interior protection;Made with triple-layer construction and industrial-strength materials the flexible and breathable rubber will not become brittle over time;The raised edges keeps all liquids and debris contained and off of your vehicles carpet;Thousands of patented OmniGrip fibers resist slipping on all types of carpet;Laser-measured for perfect, vehicle-specific contour Aries Styleguard Floor Liners offers a perfect fit everytime;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Aries StyleGuard floor liners with OmniGrip fibers offer interior protection unlike any other. They feature a triple-layer defense, a custom-molded fit and a refined finish. Unlike the industrial, utilitarian look of other floor liners and floor mats, StyleGuard offers a sleek appearance and perfectly contours to the shape of your floor. Instead of having a series of nibs or spikes, our patented OmniGrip fibers create thousands of contact points for superior slip resistance. ARIES StyleGuard floor liners are available for multiple makes and models and are backed with a limited lifetime warranty.

node.display_name: Aries Offroad Universal Removable Mud Flaps
node.long_desc: Universal Removable Mud Flap;12 x 18 inch;Semi-Gloss Black;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Back in the day, it was downright shameful for a truck to show the backside of its tires in public. There wasn't a truck in town that'd be caught dead flinging its dirt and gravel in every which direction without a care in the world. But things have changed since then. ARIES knows there's a time and a place for everything these days, and as such, our mud flaps are built with a universal design and a quick-release, pull-pin removal system. The universal bracket on each ARIES mud flap features four holes that allow it to be mounted on pretty much any truck or SUV, bolting right onto the frame and offering a solid installation. The mud flap then uses a quick-release pull-pin to be attached or detached from your truck any time, whether it's appropriate or not. ARIES removable universal mud flaps also feature strong carbon steel construction, a durable powder coat finish and are sold in pairs.

node.sales_desc: You didn't buy that Jeep just to park it in the garage, and you certainly didn't buy those off-road tires to keep them hidden. Give your off-roader the recognition it deserves with ARIES Jeep fender flares. These Jeep fender flares feature a flat profile that is specifically designed to show off larger, off-road tires. They are constructed from lightweight, rust-free aluminum and feature a unique textured black powder coat finish to maximize corrosion resistance and help hide minor scratches and grime. They are also available in a raw, paintable finish.

The ARIES bumper features a six-piece modular design with up to 16 different configurations possible. Each piece can be attached or detached as desired, giving you complete freedom of customization and a look that best characterizes your Jeep.

node.long_desc: Interchangeable design for easy customization of your truck or SUV;Helps protect lights bars from theft and the elements;High-strength carbon steel construction;Durable semi-gloss black powder coat finish for excellent rust resistance;Securely bolts onto the patented Pro Series center crossbar;Interchangeable with other Pro Series grille guard cover plates;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The ARIES Pro Series grille guard is unlike any other grille guard or brush guard on the road today because of its patented center crossbar. The unique crossbar is able to house a single-row LED light bar, allowing you to truly set your truck apart from all others. To further stylize your truck or SUV, the Pro Series grille guard can also accept this interchangeable grille guard cover plate. It easily bolts on and provides added security for your aftermarket lights and a customized look for your front end. We offer a total of eight cover plate options with four different styles and three different finishes to choose from, allowing you to find the look that best complements your vehicle.

What's that you're saying to yourself? Who cares? Listen here, pilgrim, this superpower tag team of coatings means better protection against scratches, chipping, salt, UV-rays, moisture and seasonal bear attacks. That means you won't have to worry yourself sick about ruining the finish on your side bars. And that means there is nothing stopping you from taking your truck out any time, day or night, in any kind of weather. Apology accepted.

node.display_name: Bully Dog Duramax Transmission Shift Enhancer
node.long_desc: Allison Transmission Shift Enhancer;Increase Line Pressure; Reduces Transmission Slippage; Firmer Quicker Shifts; For Use In 2001-2005 Allison 1000,2000 And 2400 Transmissions;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: These transmission kits increase line pressure in the transmission, which reduces torque converter and transmission clutch slippage and improves shifting. Easy to install using basic hand tools. Bully Dog's shift enhancers improve shift and line pressure while reducing slipping and lowering heat. The end result is firmer, quicker shifts which vastly improves the driving experience and longevity of the transmission by lowering transmission temperatures. The Allison Shift Enhancer is the simplest, most effective kit available without having to pull the transmission. It literally gives the clutches more traction in the clutch packs. It allows for a quicker shift and 50 hp worth of additional holding power for the Allison 1000, 2000 and 2400 transmissions.

node.long_desc: H11 Night Tech Bulb 55w 3600K, Twin Pack;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Night-Tech line of high output replacement bulbs from PIAA features several advancements in performance, durability, and manufacturing. Through the use of a unique mix of gasses including a higher proportion of inert gasses as well as a new filament material these bulbs offer up to 90% more light than a conventional bulb with a greater life span. The gasses, filament material, and coatings on the bulbs offer a color temperature in the 3600 Kelvin range for a whiter output than standard bulbs and retain a DOT/SAE approval. The unique dual band bulb coatings not only create a whiter light but a brighter, longer range (up to 35 meters) output when compared to other replacement bulbs.

node.sales_desc: Designed to help full-sized pickups work hard on pavement, then work just as hard when roads are muddy, snowy, and rocky?or when there are no roads at all. node.sales_desc: Pavement is optional with these versatile all-terrain tires. They offer over 40 percent more tread life than the leading competitors, a blatantly aggressive tread design, and a quiet ride. Their aggressive tread pattern offers good traction in bad conditions, on pavement or off. The all-new Open Country A/T II also comes with an industry-leading 65,000-mile.

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 27 to 33 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 22 inch diameter;Black and Outlined White Letter Sidewall;Tread Type: All Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This all-season tire balances optimal comfort, quiet performance and sure handling in city as well as open-road driving. Designed for light trucks, SUVs and crossover vehicles, the Open Country H/T is available in a wide range of original equipment sizes. P-Metric and Metric Sizes have a 60,000 miles treadwear warranty. Light Truck Sizes: Limited warranty only; treadwear warranty does not apply. Stability Rib in shoulder area reduces irregular wear. Symmetric, Variable Pitch Tread Design enables cross rotation to reduce irregular wear and reduces noise generated between road and tire. node.display_name: Bd Diesel Triple Torque Force Converter
node.long_desc: BD Diesel Triple Torque Force Converter;Diameter: 12 in.;Stall Speed: 200 RPM Increase;Lock Up: Lockup;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: In high torque, high-load situations, the torque converter bears the brunt of the engine?s force. Stock torque converter stator pitch designs slip excessively, causing the oil to foam and ever heat, and the front cover clutch surface to warp. But BD?s torque converter was specifically designed to handle the kind of punishment you dish out. Built on our premises in a state-of-the-art transmission facility, BD converters feature a heavy duty stamp forged steel cover, much thicker than stock and it is actually stronger than steel billet. We double the amount of lock up clutch material of a stock unit. We furnace braze the turbine and impellor fins to prevent internal leakage, turbine and lock up piston are balanced separately and then as a complete assembly. Turbine to impellor clearance and over all convertor height is verified. Our own cast aluminum stator design maximizes the low-speed torque characteristics of the Cummins engine and we even have high rpm stall stators for those race applications.

node.long_desc: Material:Cast Ductile Iron;Size:16cm;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Reduce turbo lag on early Dodge 5.9L's with turbine housings that give better bottom end response and more horsepower. Inexpensive increase in power!

node.long_desc: Ford 4R100 Transmission Tugger Shift Kit; Reduce Transmission Slipping; Firm shifts; Longer Transmission Life. For Use In 1989-2003 Ford 4R100 Transmission;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Help your transmission handle the loads you carry with the BD Diesel Tugger Transmission Shift Kit

node.display_name: Bd Diesel Super Max Turbo Kit
node.long_desc: Rear Wheel Horsepower Range:275-550;Compressor Housing Finish: Natural;Type Of Kit: Complete;Air Filter Kit: Optional;State Legal: No;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Take your Duramax to the next level with BD?s SuperMax turbo system. Using the BD/AirWerks S300 turbo, the SuperMax creates enough airflow for 275-550 rear wheel horsepower (rwhp), at 40 lbs. of boost on diesel only. The unique BD/AirWerks compressor wheel creates quicker spool up, while greater overall efficiency lowers EGT?s, reduces exhaust emissions and improves BD Diesel Fuel economy over the stock turbo system. A six-pad thrust bearing and a revised oiling system vastly increases reliability. Designed as a direct replacement for the stock turbo, the SuperMax system comes with everything needed for installation, including a cast-iron pedestal adapter, exhaust down BD Diesel Pipe, oil drain tube, hoses, gaskets and hardware.

node.long_desc: Customized mounting brackets ensure a perfect fit and a weight capacity of 500 lbs.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Customized mounting brackets ensure a perfect fit and a weight capacity of 500 lbs.

node.display_name: Bd Diesel Super B Special Turbo Kit
node.long_desc: Rear Wheel Horsepower Range:375-525;Compressor Housing Finish: Natural;Type Of Kit: Complete;Air Filter Kit: Optional;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Super B Special bridges the performance gap between the Super B turbo and the Super B twin system. Flowing an amazing 80 lbs. of air per minute (compared to 61 lbs./minute for the Super B), the Super B Special is perfect for late-model Cummins common-rail or modified 12-valve engines and can deliver enough air for 375-525 rear wheel horsepower on diesel only. Add the larger BD BD Diesel Cool-It interBD Diesel Cooler and a shot of nitrous oxide, and the Special will produce even higher power levels with adequate BD Diesel Fuel BD Diesel Delivery. Kit includes down BD Diesel Pipe, clamps and adjustable wastegate.

node.long_desc: Instant throttle response;Diesel or Gas engines;Quicker turbocharger spooling;Easy to install with factory connections;Adjustable sensitivity levels;Reduce Pedal Lag;+50% and +100% Modes;Optional Dash Switch Kit;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Boost throttle sensitivity and engine response that reduces that laggy pedal feeling for snappier in-town driving performance with BD?s Throttle Sensitivity Booster. By reducing the pedal lag, we force your performance curve to occur sooner to achieve quicker turbocharger spooling. Easy to install module with factory connections is adjustable to boost throttle signals by 50% or 100%.

node.long_desc: Includes shift lever;Steering wheel wiring harness with factory connections;Mini / Dimmable gear selection display;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Access all 5 gears and control Overdrive with a tap of your finger just like the new 6.7L powered trucks do. Utilizing factory connectors the TapShifter gives the ability to select the gear you want. Controls your converter lock-up clutch for pulling heavy loads up and down hills or dyno testing, and, controls overdrive for in town driving or towing. Works great with engine retarders like BD's own VVB. Kit includes a new OE style 6.7L shift lever and mini / dimmable gear selection display.

node.sales_desc: BD?s Steering Box Stabilizer (SBS) eliminates steering wander and wobble caused by excessive shaft play in the steering box of late-model Dodge trucks. Designed for easy, bolt-in installation in about an hour, the SBS virtually eliminates frame flex at the steering box mounting point, resulting in more positive steering feel.

node.display_name: BD Diesel Shut Down Solenoid Kits
node.long_desc: Bolt-on Installation;OEM Replacement;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The P7100 pump on the 1994-1998 Dodge Cummins utilizes a 12-volt electric solenoid that, over time, will stop functioning. Don't let it leave you stranded??get a BD Diesel replacement solenoid to keep on hand in case you ever run into trouble.

node.display_name: BD Diesel Super B Single Turbochargers
node.long_desc: Rear Wheel Horsepower Range:250-425;Compressor Housing Finish: Natural;Type Of Kit: Complete;Air Filter Kit: Optional;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Designed for 1994-2007 5.9L BD Diesel Dodge trucks, the Super B Single supports modified applications making 250-425 rwhp. Featuring BorgWarner?s unique Extended Tip compressor wheel technology and low inertia, full-floating journal bearings, these turbos utilize BD?s unique dual-volute turbine housing. This proven design utilizes low rpm exhaust pulses for improved turbine response, while the dualaction waste gate bleeds off turbine drive pressure from both volutes. BD?s turbo systems also feature a heavy-duty waste gate actuator that prevents premature opening caused by high exhaust pressure. You can even fine-tune for ambient temperature and barometric pressure changes using BD?s adjustable waste gate control. The Super B single offers quick spool-up, BD Diesel Cooler EGT?s, no surging and can easily be upgraded to a twin system for more power. Kit includes down BD Diesel Pipe or adapter, clamps and installation hardware.

node.long_desc: OEM Replacement Injector;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Hard starting, excessive smoke, poor fuel economy, rough running, sluggish response are signs that your injectors might be wearing out. BD Diesel's stock replacment injectors are exactly what you need to get your truck back to top performance and economy.

node.long_desc: Starter Solenoid;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: These Powermaster diode assemblies are what you need to finish the job. They come with preterminated wire connectors and are shrink-wrapped for maximum protection.

node.long_desc: Ultra Torque Starter;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: There are several choices when it comes to buying a performance starter. Powermaster has a wide range of choices to fit just about any application. Narrowing the choices down to exactly the right unit can be accomplished in three steps:Step 1:Torque Requirements-Speaking in general terms, a over 12:1 compression or higher engine should use a 200 ft.lb. starter. Engines up to 12:1 should use at least a 180 ft.lb. starter. 160 ft.lb. starters are good for engines up to 10.5:1.Step 2:Fitment-Consider headers, oil pans, and the mounting points on the engine and what size ring gear do you have.Step 3:Weight-Lastly, depending on the form of racing, the overall weight of the starter is a consideration.

node.long_desc: Starter Solenoid Repair Kit;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: These Powermaster replacement solenoids are a direct replacement for your Powermaster starter.

node.display_name: Powermaster Ultra Torque High Speed Starter
node.long_desc: Ultra Torque High Speed Starter;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: There are several choices when it comes to buying a performance starter. Powermaster has a wide range of choices to fit just about any application. Narrowing the choices down to exactly the right unit can be accomplished in three steps:Step 1:Torque Requirements-Speaking in general terms, a over 12:1 compression or higher engine should use a 200 ft.lb. starter. Engines up to 12:1 should use at least a 180 ft.lb. starter. 160 ft.lb. starters are good for engines up to 10.5:1.Step 2:Fitment-Consider headers, oil pans, and the mounting points on the engine and what size ring gear do you have.Step 3:Weight-Lastly, depending on the form of racing, the overall weight of the starter is a consideration.

node.sales_desc: Mag-Hytec's heavy duty differential covers and transmission pans provide increased lubricant and cooling capacity for hard working recreational and service vehicles. Mag-Hytec covers and pans set your vehicle apart in both aesthetics and function cast in A356-T6 aluminum and texture powder coated black with machined cooling fins. Magnetic drain plugs trap worn gear material promoting fluid integrity. Each unit is fitted with ARP 568 O-rings for superior sealing. All hardware is 303 stainless steel, in most applications no gasket or sealant is required, and all Mag-Hytec parts are covered by a lifetime limited warranty. Depend on Mag-Hytec when you're pulling a heavy load.

node.display_name: Blue Torch Fabworks Grill Hoop Kits
node.long_desc: The inchBTF grille Hoop Kit for Jeep TJ/YJ inch was designed with the DIY fabricator in mind. A welder is required to complete the installation. The grille hoop welds into place where the stock sway bar mounts are located on the top side of the TJ frame. When installing the kit it is recommended to use a Currie Anti-Rock Sway bar in place of the factory unit. The kit includes one TJ/YJ grille hoop, two brace tubes, and one front hoop. The grille hoop and front hoop are made from 1-3/4 inch x .120 inch wall DOM tube and the two brace tubes are 1-1/2 inch x .120 inch wall DOM tube. This kit requires that you have cut fenders or tube fenders. This kit will not work with a body lift.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: The latest addition to Old Man Emu?s 4WD suspension range, Nitrocharger Sport is the most advanced and innovative 4x4 shock absorber on the market, and is now available for a range of vehicles. Designed by a dedicated team of OME ride control engineers through an exhaustive vehicle specific development program, Nitrocharger Sport 4x4 shock absorbers deliver the best control, durability and most comfortable ride over all terrain. Features: Engineered for both on road drivability and off road touring. Durability proven under extensive laboratory and Outback testing, supported by scientific data logging. Instantaneously adapts to the terrain. The most finely tuned 4x4 shock absorber on the market, with all valving work carried out in Australia by OME?s ride control engineers. Dramatically improved low and high speed control for increased comfort and control over all road surfaces. Fully compatible with Old Man Emu?s extensive range of springs, bushes and hardware for a complete integrated 4WD suspension system. Back-up from more than 120 authorised outlets Australia-wide, and also supported by ARB's international dealer network. 3 year, 60,000km warranty. Made in Australia.

Spare repair cords are also available in packs of 50 from ARB, so before you head out on your next 4x4 trip, make sure you've got all the necessary equipment for making emergency repairs.

node.display_name: SCT Performance X4 Power Flash Programmer
node.long_desc: The X4 Power Flash arrives Pre-Loaded with DYNO Proven tune files that increase horsepower and torque. Programming your vehicle with one of SCT's pre-loaded performance or fuel economy tune files is as easy as 1-2-3. Simply plug the OBDII connector into your vehicle's OBDII port, select the pre-loaded tune file using the simple to navigate menu and within minutes the X4 programs your vehicle. With a large backlit display, the SCT X4 Power Flash makes it EASY to read the Built-In Data Logging or Real Time Monitored Vehicle Data, view popular sensor data such as EGT, Air / Fuel Ratio or any other 0-5 Volt source. The X4 Power Flash device backs up your factory PCM program during installation should you ever need to return your vehicle to the stock PCM program. Restoring your vehicle to the stock PCM program is as easy as selecting Return to Stock from the device menu.;California Residents: WARNING"

Simply plug the OBDII connector into your vehicle's OBDII port, select the pre-loaded tune file using the simple to navigate menu and within minutes the X4 programs your vehicle. With a large backlit display, the SCT X4 Power Flash makes it EASY to read the Built-In Data Logging or Real Time Monitored Vehicle Data, view popular sensor data such as EGT, Air / Fuel Ratio or any other 0-5 Volt source. The X4 Power Flash device backs up your factory PCM program during installation should you ever need to return your vehicle to the stock PCM program. Restoring your vehicle to the stock PCM program is as easy as selecting Return to Stock from the device menu.

node.long_desc: Low/high mount intakes;Modular design converts from low mount intake to high mount snorkel in minutes;OE fit - intrinsic styling blends perfectly with factory trim;Easy install - straight forward install required no cutting to exterior body panels;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Just one look at the Rugged Ridge AmFib Snorkel System for Wrangler JL & Gladiator JT models and you know this is not your typical snorkel. We designed the Low Mount Snorkel to make a visual splash by devising a base that blends seamlessly with the factory cowl panel and then topped it off with a low air intake that instantly becomes the focal point that you can't take your eyes off of. While making such a big splash is great, our quest for a superior snorkel went far beyond the visual. We engineered the entire AmFib snorkel inside the Jeep to literally make waves, by designing a system that is over-engineered to be less invasive, performs better and installs easier than any snorkel we've ever built before. The entire system and its components look at-home, as though they we're part of the Jeeps original design. But where the rubber really meets the road is where the AmFib Snorkel truly shinesQuickly swap the low air intake for the High Mount Intake and you can defy water crossings with total confidence. Patents Pending and U.S. Patent 8,960,347."

node.long_desc: Clamps on to any bar;Simple to install regardless of the application;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The X-Clamp from Rugged Ridge features Pivotal Fit Technology, an innovative and unique adjustment which allows perfect fit mounting to tubes ranging from 2.25 to 3 inches. No gaps, no gaskets! Rotate the X-Clamp to fit your tube, pivot the mounting bracket to the desired position, and then apply the logo to the front.

node.long_desc: Protecting your engine from dust and water ingestion is essential when driving off road. A Safari snorkel will ensure that clean, dry air is always available, regardless of conditions.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Protecting your engine from dust and water ingestion is essential when driving off road. A Safari snorkel will ensure that clean, dry air is always available, regardless of conditions.

node.long_desc: 3.6L engine;Full snorkel kit with high mount extension;No cutting required in firewall, fender or hood;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Dusty trail rides and deep water fordings, anyone who takes their Jeep off-road is likely to encounter these conditions someday. The new Modular XHD Snorkel System from Rugged Ridge relocates the vulnerable stock air intake location to help reduce dust clogged filters and the risk of hydro-locking your engine. It is the first and currently only snorkel designed with the modular functionality of a pre-filter Low Mount and Ram High Mount air intake design. Unlike other snorkels, you dont have to give up flexibility for functionality. The Modular XHD Snorkel System comes standard with a Low Mount pre-filter and the Ram High Mount extension. The Low Mount pre-filter relocates the intake below the windshield, drawing cool air from outside the hot engine bay. The Ram High Mount extension moves the intake up an additional 21 inch to the top of the windshield. The two air intake mounts are easily interchangeable to give you the modular functionality best suited to your needs. The system is manufactured from durable heavy gauge plastic, mandrel bent aluminum and hi-temp silicone connecting hoses. The built-in manual drain valves channel away excess water to prevent it from entering the intake system. This snorkel installs with minor modifications to the fender, but without the major cutting and surgery that other kits require. The new lower air cleaner box installs in place of the factory unit, so you dont have to inchhack and tap inch.

node.sales_desc: This harness is designed for 1992-1997 5.7L LT1/LT4 & 4.3L (V8) L99 engines with a 4L60E transmission, using a '94-'97 ECM. This harness will not work with ?92-?93 ECMs . These engines and transmissions were factory equipped in Camaro, Firebird, Corvette, Roadmaster, Impala and Caprice. These harnesses also include a VATS bypass module, painless part #64024. The 4L60E transmission used must be a 1994+ which utilizes a 13th pin on the transmission connector. When using either of these harnesses on a '96 or '97 engine you must replace the coil, coil output wire and knock sensor with the parts from a '92 -'95 engine. Included with this harness is an 8 circuit modular fuse block, detailed step-by-step manual, and GM color coded wires with labels for easy installation.

node.long_desc: Finished cab corner caps featuring a softer seal for a more finished appearance;Molded and die-cut A-panel and B-side bumpers;Finished rail end caps;Secure and durable prop rod clips;Matte-finished elevator bolts;Matte Black Clamps;Durable Aluminum Matte Finish Panels;Universal Tailgate Operation with Dual Action Seal;Injection Molded Latch Housing for Long-Term Durability;Premium Density Foam Core;Advanced Scratch and Scuff Resistance;Rated up to 400 lbs. of Evenly Distributed Weight;100% Truck Bed Access;Sleek, Low-Profile Design;Premium UV Resistance;EPDM Outer Rail Seals for Maximum Water Resistance;Automatic Latching Panels;Integrated Buckle System that secures the open cover in the Flipped Flat" position without obscuring view from back window;Extended 3-year Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
We proudly introduce to you the all new BAKFlip MX4! This cover features all of the same great features of the top-sellling BAKFlip G2, with some very important differences! The aluminum surfaced panels have a heavy duty core making them much more rigid when compared to the G2, with virtually no additon to the weight of the cover. This cover is also the first hard paneled cover with a sleek matte black finish that offers superior UV and scratch resistance when compared to the G2. In addition, the MX4 has upgraded latch housing components and our new Dual Action Seal" allows you to close the tailgate without having to open the last panel!
The BAKFlip G2 requires you to open the last panel before closing the tailgate. The newest innovation coming from the minds at BAK is the Dual Action Seal Which allows you to open and close the cover tailgate without ever having to open the cover! This revolutionary feature esures a great seal at the tailgate without ever having to open the cover. If you have something in one hand, and you need to close the tailgate, with this cover it is no problem as you simply slam your tailgate shut with the other hand!

When you haul around valuables daily, you want something to keep those belongings secure from weather and the hands of others. Rain, snow and hail can't be stopped. Curious eyes also should avoided. After all, you tools and equipment are assets. They should be protected, and your mind should be at ease. 4 Wheel Parts has what you need to gain that much desired peace and security. The bakflip mx4 tonneau covers are durable accessories, improving your truck and travels.

It's a Necessary Defense

As you drive down the highway, you're safe inside the cab. Wind and rain isn't going to get to you; however, what are you bringing with you. That truck bed is spacious, permitting you to bring business and perso"

node.long_desc: 16 oz. bottle;Protects from rust, corrosion and electrolysis;Redusces engine temps up to 20 degrees;Prevents deposits;Lowers cylinder head temps allowing for advanced ignition timing which yields more hp;Treats 12-20 qts.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Not For Use In Cooling Systems That Use Proprietary or Manufacturer Specific Coolants. Lucas Super Coolant has been scientifically formulated to provide the ultimate protection in automotive and racing cooling systems. It protects the entire system from rust, corrosion and electrolysis including aluminum and has been proven to reduce coolant temperatures up to 20F. Our unique formula prevents deposits that can cause overheating. Lower cylinder head temperatures means advanced ignition time and more horsepower. One bottle treats 12-20 quarts of a 50/50 water antifreeze mix. Two bottles are required for straight water coolant. For passenger cars, light trucks and SUV's use every 30,000 miles. For racing applications use every race as needed.

node.sales_desc: The all-new Rigid Ignite is the smallest, most versatile light in Rigid Industries' product line! Measuring approximately 1.4 x 1.4" x 2", this flexible light packs 1000 raw lumens using Spot, Flood or Diffused beam patterns; perfect for any application where short range light output is needed. The compact and lightweight housing makes the Ignite a great choice for auxiliary lighting on cars and trucks, motorcycles, UTVs, and even marine applications. Low current draw (less than 1 amp) and voltage requirements (6-28 volts) makes the Ignite adaptable to any application. Single light kits include one Ignite, and related hardware."

Includes two D-ring mounts for those sticky situations.

node.long_desc: Delivers improved horsepower, torque and mileage from your vehicle;Simply replace the restrictive stock mass air sensor
node.sales_desc: The JET Powr-Flo Mass Air Sensor delivers improved horsepower, torque and mileage from your vehicle by simply replacing the restrictive stock mass air sensor. The factory sensor not only is a major restrictive point in stock intake systems, but it also limits the full potential of aftermarket cold air intake systems.

node.display_name: Jet Performance Products Program For Power Jet Performance Programmer
node.long_desc: The JET Performance Programmer lets you take control and program your own vehicle computer to match your driving style. JET?s exclusive Tri-Power tuning allows you to program for performance using lower cost regular octane fuel, or for optimal performance gains you can program for midgrade or premium fuels. All three tuning modes are designed to operate the engine at peak efficiency based on the octane level being used to improve horsepower and mileage. The advanced technology and design of the JET Programmer gives you the ability to modify air and fuel ratios, ignition timing, shift points, shift firmness, speed limiter and rev limiter settings. The programmer will also correct your speedometer and turn off the ABS system trouble light if you change tire size or gear ratios. Also includes a built in scan tool to read and clear diagnostic trouble codes when your check engine light comes on saving you a costly trip to the dealer. The programmer simply plugs into the vehicle?s diagnostic port under the dash and then the easy to use installation software allows you to make your changes by answering simple yes or no questions. Take the next step in performance tuning with the JET Performance Programmer!;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The JET Performance Programmer lets you take control and program your own vehicle computer to match your driving style. node.long_desc: High Visibility 3rd Brake Light;Installation Instructions;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Move your 3rd brake light away from it's vulnerable OEM location! Your spare tire is safely hidden away behind your Jeep and clear from debris and damage. Let's move your 3rd brake light up to the same safe haven. If you've added an aftermarket tire carrier like our rear tire carrier and bumper combinations then you need to relocate your 3rd brake light. Add our CHMSL 3rd brake light to your factory harness by splicing a few wires and you've now got a high visibility fully functional 3rd brake light!The two piece harness with weather resistant connectors allows you to remove your 3rd brake light without the need of tools should you need to access your spare tire. It does not get any simpler than the included quick detach weatherproof plug.

node.long_desc: Matte black;5 tab light bar;holds up to a 9 inch light or a 50 inchLED lightbar;Easy install-No Drill;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Smittybilt's XRC light bar is an easy and simple way to Mount your 9 inch lights or 50 inch LED Light Bar and brighten up the night. Every XRC Light Bar features race inspired side supports manufactured out of a single solid piece of cold rolled steel. This is a complete bolt on and requires no drilling or modifications to the vehicle. The main cross bar is manufactured from 1.5 inch race tubing that features 5 light tabs that can accommodate up to a 9 inch light or a 50 inch LED light bar and is completely adjustable.

node.long_desc: Two-stage textured matte black finish;New Gen2 solid d-ring and jack point mount - welded on the inside and out;Aggressive design for with raised corners for better entry and exit angles for the most extreme conditions;1.75 inch 120 Wall over rider and kickers;Lower design winch plate allows greater air flow and rated to accommodate up to 10k winch;O.E. fog light provision;Manufactured from 3/16 inch cold rolled steel;Tow-able D-ring mounts;Powder coat finish with 5-year limited warranty;Smittybilt Advantage lifetime warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The XRC Gen 2 Max Front Stubby Bumper has a high degree approach angle and raised corners to maximize ground clearance. The bumper is manufactured from 3/16 cold rolled steel and then robotically welded to the exact specifications. The solid D-ring mounts are welded on the inside and outside (D-rings sold separately). Welds are ground down and smoothed out, then a two stage textured matte black powder coat is applied for the ultimate look. The front stinger is 1.75 tubing and has light tabs that can hold up to two 9 inch lights (lights sold separately). The bumper is winch ready and can carry winches up to a 10,000 lb. rating. The Gen 2 Front Bumper comes with fog light cutouts.

node.display_name: Smittybilt XRC Rock Crawler Winch Bumpers
node.long_desc: 2-stage Textured black powder coat;Degree approach angles and raised corners;3/16 inch cold rolled steel;Stinger is 1.75 inch tubing;Accepts up to two 9 inch lights;Bumpers bolt directly to your vehicle;5-year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The XRC Bumpers have high degree approach angles and raised corners to maximize ground clearance. Manufactured from 3/16 inch cold rolled steel and then robotically welded to the exact specifications. Welds are ground down and smoothed out, then a two stage textured matte black powder coat is applied for the ultimate look. The front stinger is 1.75 tubing and has two light tabs that can hold up to two 9 lights. It's unique design is capable of mounting up to a 10,000 lb. winch with the option of running an aluminum or roller fairlead. Each bumper is developed to be a complete bolt on and requires no modifications to the vehicle.

node.long_desc: Two-stage textured matte black powdercoat finish;3/16 inch cold rolled steel;One-piece welded design;Raised corners for better entry and exit;Built-in winch plate to accommodate up to a 12k winch;5-year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: 100% steel construction for extra durability;Black power coated for immediate use and durability or can painted to match your Jeep;Stream line design to help increase suspension articulation while maintaining the street-ability look;Less is more when it comes to XRC Fender Flares, where the OE fender does not meet your needs;CJ, YJ and TJ to be used with Smittybilt corner guards;California Residents: WARNING"

The XRC Fender Flares are 100% steel construction, for extra durability. Each XRC Fender Flare is powder coated for immediate use and durability or they can be painted to color match your ride. node.display_name: Smittybilt X2O GEN2 Comp Series Winches
node.long_desc: Smittybilt Powerful amphibious 6.6 H.P Electric Winch motor- the highest torque in the industry for Jeep Winches; Steel or synthetic rope geared for fast line speed; Multiple mounting options on the control pack;Revolutionary 3-stage Planetary Gear system for ultimate strength and quiet operation;Larger clutch for easy control during gloved operations;Integrated Wireless Remote Control;UV-resistant matte black textured finish;Inductive braking system reduces heat for long lasting performance;Oversized tie rod struts for maximum strength;Rope Sleeve to protect the synthetic rope winch line;Competition Aluminum Fairlead;Forged Hook;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The newest generation of Smittybilt X2O and XRC winches have been enhanced in almost every area for increased enhanced performance and durability. The new 6.6HP amphibious motor is connected to a 3-stage planetary gear system with revised gear ratios for increased pulling power and lightning fast line speed. The completely waterproof, state-of-the-art 500AMP solenoid has the versatility to be mounted in multiple locations depending on your application needs. Every winch is finished in a rugged UV resistant matte black coating with stainless steel hardware, oversized aluminum cross bars, a four way roller fairlead and a forged hook. You can count on Smittybilt winches to be there every time, in every situation.
The top-of-the-line X20 series features a new wireless remote control that can be wired directly to the winch or unplugged for trouble free wireless operation. For the highest performance available, check out the X2O COMP series, complete with all the features and benefits of the original series, except equipped with a stronger synthetic rope, Competition aluminum fairlead and Dynamic Braking System. This exclusive braking feature reduces drum temperatures by 66%, making is perfectly suited to operate all types of synthetic ropes. All Gen2 X20 Winches come backed by a Lifetime Mechanical Warranty and a 5-Year Electrical Warranty.
The new Gen2 series of Smittybilt X2O winches have been thoroughly updated with heavy-duty features for enhanced performance and comes standard with an integrated wireless remote. The new 6.6HP amphibious motor offers the highest torque in the industry and is connected to a 3-stage Planetary GearSystem for increased pulling power and line speed.
The COMP Series difference

node.sales_desc: Tomken is a Colorado-based corporation established in 1989 to meet the growing needs of off-highway enthusiasts. Our company's mission is to research, design, and manufacture new and better aftermarket Jeep parts. Superior engineering and workmanship coupled with the highest quality materials means the finest products available to you, our customer.Our commitment to you is to take pride in everything we produce. The trained specialists at Tomken understand what today's four wheelers need. Our corporate manufacturing facility is just north of Buena Vista, Colorado, in the heart of the Colorado Rockies. Our backyard is one of the best testing grounds in the world, and all of our products are evaluated thoroughly on and off road before they are put into production.

node.sales_desc:
If you're looking for a hard tonneau cover that literally does it all, the BakFlip G2 is it. From sleek contemporary styling to state of the art function, BakFlip G2 hard tonneau covers are sure to impress the most ardent critics. Made from tough aluminum panels, BakFlip G2 hard tonneau covers offer fantastic security, operate easily from either side of the truck, handle any kind of climate, provide full access to stake pockets, and most importantly, offer 100% unobstructed access to your entire truck bed. Hauling large items in your truck is never a problem. The ability to lock and load is finally an option with the patented features that ONLY BakFlip hard tonneau covers can offer. No other hard tonneau covers in the world can do what a BakFlip tonneau cover can do, and for the modest price of these phenomenal hard tonneau covers, theres really little that anyone can think of that the BakFlip G2 doesnt offer.

Truck owners have to be prepared for anything. Whether hauling gear for work or play, keeping it safe and secure on rugged or paved roads is made easy with a BAK industries tonneau cover. Since everyone has different needs, they are designed to accommodate various lifestyles. For people whose needs may change daily, from hauling over-sized lumber to stowing camping gear or helping a friend move, the BAKFlip G2 tonneau cover makes any adventure easy.

Durable Versatility

Known for its quality craftsmanship, BAK Industries BAKFlip G2 hard folding tonneau covers also offer versatility, which is necessary for truck owners pushing their vehicles to the limit. If you need to access the whole truck bed, part of it or have some gear that needs protection, it is designed for traveling with it folded, flipped up or closed. Its innovative locking system is activated when the tailgate is locked, letting you focus on whatever task may b"

Because the VP is constructed using New frameless panels the weight of ther tonneau has been greatly reduced. The innovations don't stop there. The VP is the lowest profile folding tonneau on the market and the styling definitley set above the rest. The entire top of the cover has been covered in OEM looking material that allows the tonneau to resemble and have the texture of the OEM bedcaps and also hide all seams in the panels. Of course it installs in under an hour and carrries the BAK 3 year warranty.

node.long_desc: Rugged Ridge XHD Wheels;3-piece wheel;Wheel Size: 17, 20 inch diameter;Bolt Pattern: 5 lug design;Finish: Black Satin;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rugged Ridge is proud to introduce the toughest design in custom wheels! Featuring a satin black finish, this 20x9-inch hub-centric design exactly centers the wheel over the hub providing the best fit possible and the proper clearance for brake rotors, steering components and suspension. Better fit, no wheel vibration! The stainless steel button-head socket cap screws around the perimeter of the outer wheel face, giving a great 3-piece look, and also lets you accessorize with our optional trim ring. Each wheel includes a UV-treated polished center cap that replicates a manual hub for that off road look. The chrome finish uses a dual-stage process to give a deep reflective mirror-like shine that commands attention. Rugged Ridge wheels have been independently tested and certified to meet/exceed SAE J2530 standards for wheel strength and durability. Limited lifetime structural warranty and 1 year finish warranty, see warranty information for details and limitations.

node.sales_desc: SuperSprings are easily and quickly installed directly above the vehicle?s rear leaf springs. They work in parallel with the vehicle?s existing suspension system and ?kick-in? on demand. The increased spring-rate produced by installing SuperSprings helps eliminate vehicle rear-end sag and improves towing capabilities. SuperSprings unique anti-sway properties reduce body roll providing enhanced driver safety and control. These features are most noticeable when cornering, encountering strong cross winds or dealing with wind buffeting from other traffic.

node.long_desc: SuperCoil Springs;Heavy Duty Replacement; Do Not Load Any Vehicle Beyond Manufacturers Gross Vehicle Weight Rating;California Residents: WARNING"

Whether you have added a snow plow, heavy-duty front bumper, winch or simply have a sagging over-worked front end, SuperCoils offers the remedy to the cause of your sag. SuperCoils features include: Maintenance free solution for front end sag, linear, constant spring rate, field tested and proven with a 30 year track record. 3 year limited product warranty
