node.sales_desc: Many years of experience have gone into the IROK to develop a tire with traction ?as good as it gets? in mud, snow and rock climbing. It has a directional tread in the famous Three Stage Lug design, scooped lugs, blade and molded siping, special sidewall features, extra tough cord and cut resistant compounds in a super traction package always...**TREAD DESIGN MAY DIFFER BY SIZE**

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 27 to 38 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 14 to 20 inch diameter;All Treads are the famous TSL (Three Stage Lug) design Tires;Black Sidewall;Tread Type: Mud Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The SSR Series of Super Swamper Radial/TSL tires are the next generation of light truck radial tires. This series has many of the OEM sizes for Sport Utility Vehicles and 4 Wheel Drive light trucks who do not want to modify their vehicles but still need the performance of Super Swampers. The design incorporates a slightly tighter tread pattern, siping for wet pavement traction and icy conditions, greater sidewall protection with traction features and is quieter running.

node.display_name: Super Swamper Trxus M/T Radial Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 31 to 38 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 22 inch diameter;All are a directional tread in the famous TSL (Three Stage Lug) design Tires;Black Sidewall;Tread Type: Mud Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The TrXus Mud Terrain is Interco's answer to the need of those who want a smooth, super quiet ride with tough, thick sidewalls with a chip and cut resistant compound. This tire has more siping than any other mud terrain on the market; which has proven to be almost magical in icy snowy conditions. These same traction features make this tire a serious rock climber. Each TrXus Mud Terrain tire has its individual specifications and is heavier than the original equipment tires of comparable size. Many brands of tires are made from generic specifications which means there are many inchbrand names inch coming out of a particular factory but all the tires have a common specification basic body or casing. The only difference is the mold the tire is cured in. The tires will have different tread designs but the body of the tire is common to many others of the same size but under various names.

node.display_name: Super Swamper TrXus STS Radial Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 29 to 38 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 20 inch diameter;All are a directional tread in the famous TSL (Three Stage Lug) design Tires;Black Sidewall;Tread Type: All Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The TrXus STS, the STS stands for Three Stage Sidewall, is a new concept in all terrain tires. These tires are not intended to be a substitute for the Super Swamper or Bogger tires but a tire for you if you spend a lot of time on the street. Besides working so well on the street it has good off road performance and excels in snow and sand. It is also very much at home in the rocks and will impress anyone with its all-around performance. This tire is going to set a new standard in the all-terrain category.

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 31 to 40 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 24 inch diameter;All Treads are the famous TSL (Three Stage Lug) design Tires;Black Sidewall;Tread Type: Mud Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Interco SS-M16 is a tire for all seasons. Several design features have been taken from the best performing all terrain and mud terrain tires. The SS-M16 is highway friendly and very quiet for a tire that has such good off road performance. It is an excellent tire that bridges the gap between the all-terrain and very aggressive off road tires and has a rugged design that will enhance the appearance of any vehicle.

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 29 to 32 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 17 to 18 inch diameter;Black and Outlined Raised White Letter Sidewall;Tread Type: All Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Michelin Tires LTX A/S is an original equipment light truck tire that offers excellent fuel efficiency and long tread life. With better fuel efficiency than leading competitors the LTX A/S fuel-efficient energy saver construction results in an easier rolling tire to help lower fuel consumption and reduce carbon emissions from your engine. Michelin uses MaxTouch Construction to maximize the tire's contact with the road and evenly distributes the forces of acceleration, braking and cornering, resulting in longer wear.

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 28 to 33 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 20 inch diameter;Black and Outlined Raised White Letter Sidewall;Tread Type: All Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Michelin LTX A/T 2 tire is a tough, long lasting all-season on-off road tire that offers excellent off-road traction and durability with uncompromising on-road comfort and handling. The optimized contact patch shape, provided by MaxTouch Construction, helps deliver extremely long tire life under the toughest conditions. Tough off-road endurance capability of the Michelin LTX A/T2 tire helps it last at least 35 percent longer on gravel than two leading class competitors. Michelin Comfort Control Technology uses computer-optimized design and precision manufacturing to offer greatly reduced vibrations and road noise.

node.display_name: Mickey Thompson ET Front Drag Racing Tires

node.sales_desc: The Mickey Thompson ET Front Drag Tire is the tire to compliment the ET Drag drive tires for a complete race tire package. These are Ultra-Lightweight Design that helps reduces rolling resistance and still acceptable for high speed use all with tubeless construction. Available in Many Popular Sizes. The Mickey Thompson ET Front Drag Tire is Not Acceptable for Land Speed Record Use and NOT FOR HIGHWAY USE! A Proven Drag Strip Winner Real world research and development give M/T slicks the edge over competitive brands. Engineered for maximum traction and consistent ET's with superior construction and compounding for nearly every drag race application.

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 22 to 35 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 13 to 16 inch diameter;White Letter Sidewall;Tread Type: Drag;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Mickey Thompson has used real world research and development to give the ET Drag slicks the edge over competitive brands. Engineered for maximum traction and consistent ET's with superior construction and compounding for nearly every drag race application.Multiple compounds for maximum traction but yet requires little or no burnout when staging. Acceptable practice for rim width is tread width plus or minus 1 inch. IMPORTANT: ALL DRAG DRIVE TIRES MUST BE MATCHED TO BE WITHIN 1/2'' ROLL OUT.
